text: Warren School District is a public school district based in Warren, Arkansas, United States. The school district provides early childhood, elementary and secondary education from its four schools in Bradley County, Arkansas. Banks School District consolidated into Warren School District on July 1, 1985."ConsolidationAnnex_from_1983.xls." Arkansas Department of Education. Retrieved on October 13, 2017. == Schools == * Warren High School * Warren Middle School * Brunson New Vision Charter School (Fourth through Fifth Grade) * Eastside Elementary School (Kindergarten through Third Grade) * Warren ABC Preschool ==References== == External links == * Category:School districts in Arkansas Category:Education in Bradley County, Arkansas
title: Warren School District
